Test Name: HIV-1 and HIV-2 Antibody Confirmation and Differentiation
Purpose: To confirm and differentiate HIV-1 and HIV-2 antibodies in plasma specimens, ensuring accurate identification of HIV infection type.
Equipment: Centrifuge, pipettes, automated or manual immunoassay analyzer (e.g., BioRad Geenius HIV-1/2), 37 Â°C incubator
